channel.title: New server @@@@@@@@@free donation promo @@@@@@@@
channel.description:
hi everyone and welcome to cram-scape the server for every one :) you like pking ? we have a perfect pking systeme with fun and risk pking plus switch are perfect :P with no lag :P almost every item can be drop ! for example : korasis sword,all god sword, bandos torva , claws , fury , fire cape , fire cape 2 (The TokHaar-Kal-Ket) and many many more :) all skill work perfectly ! we also have different xp rate for combat ! you get a better drop rate if you take the harder xp rate ! all barrows special work !
there is a promotion for this gr8 server :P the 20 first master that reach 99 in every combat skill including prayer will have a free 5 $$ donation :) so join quick :P you can also look at link below to see some pking video of cramscape and forum link :P hope to see you guys :P
Forum: https://www.cram-scape.forumperso.com
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9XkRWEGX6hc
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=04v-8s00esk
